name: Miseria RPG
description:
A visual novel where you embark on an adventure hoping to find the Angel of Mercy as you cross the hostile lands of Miseria. Good luck, adventurer.

Please note that the story contains graphic descriptions of gore, and its themes include depression, suicide, and many other intensely negative feelings.

  • illustrated by: lordcloudx
  • music by: Sleepy Agents
  • written, produced and directed by: mikey
